title: Health Helix
description: Developed a patient management system with Next.js for registration, appointment booking, and management, including admin tools, SMS notifications, and a chatbot for dental queries.

title: ComplaintFix
description: Simplifies issue reporting for students and teachers with a dashboard for monitoring and resolving issues efficiently.

title: Readscape
description: A MERN stack bookstore with Stripe integration, user authentication, personalized carts, and order history tracking.

title: EqualityEclipse
description: Educational site offering special courses for women and girls aged 15-25 via YouTube videos and webpages.

title: EarthWeatherSphere
description: Provides real-time global weather updates and temperature data with interactive maps using Cesium.js.

title: PixelPress
description: Image management platform allowing users to upload, compress, and organize images with Bootstrap and Express.js.

title: HealthMetric
description: Tool to calculate and monitor BMI values, offering users clear insights into their health and fitness status.
